item.title: Dry Cleaners

item.description: Noticed something unusual while driving around the other day, a Tide dry cleaners: Tide Dry Cleaners is changing dry cleaning for good by providing unmatched customer service and quality. Learn if we’re located near you. Turns out they are located near me. Tide as a brand is drilled into my mind as a laundry detergent. […]
item.content:encoded:
Noticed something unusual while driving around the other day, a Tide dry cleaners:

Tide Dry Cleaners is changing dry cleaning for good by providing unmatched customer service and quality. Learn if we’re located near you.

Turns out they are located near me. Tide as a brand is drilled into my mind as a laundry detergent. It was really odd to see a Tide store front.
